column1: A free people should make their own educated decisions about what is safe and how they would like to behave.   My full statement on Governor Newsom's 10 PM- 5AM forced curfew for designated "purple" counties. ⬇️ https://t.co/xteaw831Md

.@TheJusticeDept should be using all of the resources at their disposal to ensure that only legal votes are being counted in a fully transparent manner. The American people deserve to have full confidence in the result of this Presidential election. https://t.co/3Q4Bkbi8V7

The circumstances surrounding this Presidential election point to a fraudulent outcome.   The reports we’ve seen of non-residents deceased voters potential mail fraud and partisan poll watching are deeply concerning and must be challenged.
Transparency in our elections is of the utmost importance to preserve our Republic’s integrity.
Polls are officially open in California and will remain open until 8 PM tonight. Please do your civic duty and VOTE! 🇺🇸  To find your polling place visit https://t.co/1bKlJ0L7Rg

Gray wolf populations have exceeded recovery expectations for years and three Administrations have tried to delist the gray wolf from the Endangered Species Act.   @realDonaldTrump and @SecBernhardt finally got it done. https://t.co/1JgZ1qPAL7
Congratulations Justice Barrett!  @realDonaldTrump made an excellent choice when nominating Justice Barrett and she will serve the American people with honor and distinction.

Over the course of her confirmation hearings Judge Barrett unequivocally proved that her qualifications and intellect will serve her well as the next Supreme Court Justice.  #ConfirmACB https://t.co/LuauieHZ4j

I cosponsored H.J.Res. 95 to amend the U.S. Constitution and permanently set the number of SCOTUS Justices at 9.   Court packing would turn SCOTUS into a tool for partisan gain threatening the stability of our government after every election cycle.   https://t.co/11AVXDKbRL https://t.co/OQAAil5Qn5

I am honored to have received the Guardian of Small Business award from @NFIB.  As our country navigates the coronavirus pandemic small businesses need support from both consumers and Congress to bring our economy back up to speed.  #SmallBizGuardian https://t.co/7dYGdq2Yvt

Keep in your prayers the families who lost their loved ones those who lost their homes in Happy Camp and our first responders who are working to extinguish fires in California. My office will continue to assist with the federal and state response to wildfires. (4/4)

A Major Disaster Declaration will help address the high cost of recovery. I have been engaged with the Trump Administration on this issue for several weeks and I thank @realDonaldTrump  for responding to the State of California’s request for aid. 3/4

Working with our contacts at the White House and with @GOPLeader we were all able to impress on the President and his team to take another look at the FEMA denial. We expect an announcement by the President overriding that decision will be forthcoming. 2/4
The President has listened to the North State’s calls for additional disaster assistance for Siskiyou County reversing FEMA’s denial of the original request for aid. 1/4
Best wishes to Judge Amy Coney Barrett on day 1 of her Senate confirmation hearings. She is an extremely well-qualified jurist and will be a great addition to the Supreme Court.

Thanks for joining us Dr. Waldrop! I look forward to working with you to prioritize access to conservation programs that are good for waterfowl and our agriculture lands across the country. https://t.co/GOkKbFaYp9

The #PPP saved 12 million jobs in rural America. Speaker Pelosi has stalled for weeks to revive this tested and effective program.  As more businesses close their doors for good each day now is not the time to play politics with the approximately $135 billion in #PPP reserves.
All Evacuation Orders and Warnings have been lifted in Butte County. Please use caution and follow local guidelines as you return to your homes. https://t.co/xl17fgn7Cm
Praying that @realDonaldTrump and @FLOTUS have a safe and speedy recovery from #COVID19 https://t.co/cpSMQNWgFx
.@realDonaldTrump is right -- forest management is the best way to stop wildfires from ravaging the West.

Several Evacuation Orders and Warnings have been lifted in Butte County. Read below for more information. https://t.co/4j0rj0SVgQ

Endless pointless environmental lawsuits as well as the state and longtime federal bureaucracies stand in the way of the active land management that would prevent these disasters from ravaging our region year-after-year. 3/3

Many in the North State are all too familiar with the devastating losses that come with the fire season. As Dave points out this loss of land wildlife and property is preventable should we listen to the locals who understand their predicaments best. 2/3

This account of the #NorthComplexWestZone aftermath by Dave Daley a Butte County rancher is heartbreaking and real. This tragedy his fine family and many others are enduring grieves me greatly and all who would read his story. https://t.co/HjFXyn6ei5

There were several overnight Evacuation Orders and Warnings issued in Butte County. Click the link below to see the most recent map from @ButteSheriff outlining the current evacuation updates. #NorthComplexWestZone   https://t.co/Blt5qMB7bS

Throughout numerous disasters @realDonaldTrump has been highly supportive of helping Californians recover. His visit to Sacramento signaled that the federal response to wildfire is and will remain a top priority of his Administration. Thank you President Trump!

Today we memorialize the 2977 innocent lives we lost and recognize the incredible heroism from first responders in New York City at the Pentagon and the passengers on board United Flight 93 who prevented the plane from crashing into our nation’s Capitol. We must #NeverForget. https://t.co/9cdCmDSdZG

Biological male athletes “identifying” as women and girls are undermining the integrity of women’s sports. I urge my colleagues to support fairness for female athletes by cosponsoring the Protection of Women and Girls in Sports Act.

Our society has quickly "normalized" gender experimentation under the guise of an "accepting" political ideology rather than biological reality. Our children should not have to pay the high price for these unethical medical interventions. https://t.co/rrChGDfs71

Glad to join @RepJimmyPanetta in the House and @SteveDaines @SenFeinstein in the Senate in introducing the Emergency Wildfire & Public Safety Act to streamline forest management projects in the West and protect our areas from wildfire.  My full statement: https://t.co/dzmUKhotg2 https://t.co/uO2ueGIdO7

.@tiktok_us is an espionage campaign against American citizens.  We can't allow the #CCP to invade Americans' privacy to eventually use it against us.   I agree with the President -- an American company needs to buy TikTok and keep our data secure.

Thanks to my friend and colleague for recognizing our work to streamline vegetation management around local utilities rights-of-way. Wildfire season wreaks havoc on the West and this bill aims to protect our forests electrical grids and rural areas from wildfire threats. https://t.co/g92vvmnInk

Thank you @SecBernhardt and @usbr Commissioner Burman for listening to all parties on your visit earlier this month and investing in a viable solution to ending the Klamath Basin's struggle for water.  https://t.co/ZPIPu9IFZT
